section.title: Available Documentation
section.para: The following &PRODNAME; documentation is available as of v1.0:
Getting Started Guide: This high-level introduction provides an architectural overview and summarizes several deployment methods.
Glossary: The &PRODNAME; glossary defines key terms as they are used in the context of &PRODABBREV; documentation.
Component Reference Guide: The Repose Component Reference Guide is a non-procedural collection of key facts designed to be helpful in preparing to use specific components of &PRODNAME;.
